exportDescription: Download your library as a file, or copy the export string to your clipboard. Import it on any device to restore or share your creature library.
importDescription: Import creatures and categories from a previous export. Choose a file or paste an export string below. Any matching entries will be updated.
libraryPageDescription: Manage creatures and categories. Add them to combat from the combat view.
noCategoriesForFilter: No categories yet. Add one to organize creatures.
noCategoriesInForm: No categories yet. Create one first.
noCategoriesYet: No categories yet. Create one to organize creatures.
noCreaturesSelected: No creatures selected. Return to the library to choose creatures.
noCreaturesYet: No creatures yet. Create one to get started.

deleteCategory.message: Are you sure you want to delete this category? Creatures in this category will not be deleted.
deleteCategory.title: Delete category

deleteCreature.message: Are you sure you want to delete this creature? This cannot be undone.
deleteCreature.title: Delete creature

bulkDeleteCategories.message_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} category? Creatures in these categories will not be deleted.
bulkDeleteCategories.message_other: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} categories? Creatures in these categories will not be deleted.

bulkDeleteCreatures.message_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} creature? This cannot be undone.
bulkDeleteCreatures.message_other: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} creatures? This cannot be undone.
